articles.author: Eleanor Pringle
articles.title: Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio warns U.S. is headed for civil war - Fortune
articles.description: Dalio said there are two outcomes for America: Either the nation pulls together and rises above, or conflicting sides exert as much pain on the other as they can.
articles.content: Bridgewater Associates founder Ray Dalio is always on the lookout for the next issue which could derail the economy. He, like many others, is extremely concerned about national debt. Hes also mindful… [+3469 chars]
